flawed_nl_solution:
The fixer used 3/10*400 = <<3/10*400=210>>210 nails to fix the kitchen.
The number of nails remaining in the container after he fixes the kitchen is 400-210 = <<400-210=190>>190
He also uses 7/10*190 = <<7/10*190=133>>133 of the nails remaining in the container to fix the fence.
The total number of nails which the fixer hasn't used is 190-133 = <<190-133=57>>57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
